ygData.subject: RE: Sealed poison vials
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t think the recipe for sealed poison vials has been determined yet. It is not the same recipe as the other 2.  Also from what I ve heard rogues don t
ygData.messageBody:
I don't think the recipe for sealed poison vials has been determined yet. It
is not the same recipe as the other 2. Also from what I've heard rogues
don't have a use for sealed poison vials yet, though I'm not sure if this is
true or not.

Tanana - Bristlebane
Master Brewer
Master Potter
Excellent Beggar

-----Original Message-----
From: Sean Dorsey [mailto:sdorsey@...]
Sent: Friday, September 10, 1999 8:08 AM
To: EQ_Potters@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Potters] Sealed poison vials


From: "Sean Dorsey" <sdorsey@...>

I have been making the two poison vials for a while now building up my
skill, I have made lined poison vials but they are getting to the point I
get very little training on them. I moved to sealed Poison vials, and the
recipe seems to have changed. I used: one water, one sealed poison vial
sketch, one small block of clay, and a zombie skin, combine, and this did
not work.

I have used Zombie skins for all the other vials so it should work, do I
need a cork or something for the 'Sealed' part?

Dass Swiftruner
Cazic-Thul
